documentation.text: @notice A mixin to distribute funds when an NFT is sold.
@notice Returns true if the given NFT has not been sold in this market previously and is being sold by the creator.

@dev A helper that determines if this is a primary sale given the current seller.
 This is a minor optimization to use the seller if already known instead of making a redundant lookup call.
@notice Returns the current fee configuration in basis points.

@notice Returns how funds will be distributed for a sale at the given price point.
 @dev This could be used to present exact fee distributing on listing or before a bid is placed.

@dev Calculates how funds should be distributed for the given sale details.
 If this is a primary sale, the creator revenue will appear as `ownerRev`.
@dev Distributes funds to Minted, creator, and NFT owner after a sale.
@notice Allows Minted to change the market fees.
@notice A mixin to distribute funds when an NFT is sold.
@notice Returns true if the given NFT has not been sold in this market previously and is being sold by the creator.

@dev A helper that determines if this is a primary sale given the current seller.
 This is a minor optimization to use the seller if already known instead of making a redundant lookup call.
@notice Returns the current fee configuration in basis points.

@notice Returns how funds will be distributed for a sale at the given price point.
 @dev This could be used to present exact fee distributing on listing or before a bid is placed.

@dev Calculates how funds should be distributed for the given sale details.
 If this is a primary sale, the creator revenue will appear as `ownerRev`.
@dev Distributes funds to Minted, creator, and NFT owner after a sale.
@notice Allows Minted to change the market fees.

_getFees(address,uint256,address,uint256.details: Calculates how funds should be distributed for the given sale details. If this is a primary sale, the creator revenue will appear as `ownerRev`.

getFees(address,uint256,uint256).details: This could be used to present exact fee distributing on listing or before a bid is placed.

getFeeConfig().notice: Returns the current fee configuration in basis points.

getFees(address,uint256,uint256).notice: Returns how funds will be distributed for a sale at the given price point.

getIsPrimary(address,uint256).notice: Returns true if the given NFT has not been sold in this market previously and is being sold by the creator.

getMintedTreasury().notice: Returns the address of the Minted treasury.

getPendingWithdrawal(address).notice: Returns how much funds are available for manual withdraw due to failed transfers.

withdraw().notice: Allows a user to manually withdraw funds which originally failed to transfer.

userdoc.notice: A mixin to distribute funds when an NFT is sold.
